Some product or celebrity zooms from total obscurity to viral sensation. What you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know is that someone is responsible for all this. Usually, someone like me.

IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m a media manipulator. In a world where blogs control and distort the news, my job is to control blogsÃ¢â‚¬â€as much as any one person can.
 
In todayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s cultureÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
1) Blogs like Gawker, Buzzfeed and the Huffington Post drive the media agenda.

3) Manipulators wield these levers to shape everything you read, see and watchÃ¢â‚¬â€online and off.

Why am I giving away these secrets?  Because I'm tired of a world where blogs take indirect bribes, marketers help write the news, reckless journalists spread lies, and no one is accountable for any of it. I'm pulling back the curtain because I don't want anyone else to get blindsided.

IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m going to explain exactly how the media really works. What you choose to do with this information is up to you.
